website_summaries.verdict: The look may not be for everyone, but this warmer works well and is pretty indestructible.
pros: Holes are well-placed in it so wind or drafts will not be a factor for the candle
Many found this to be an attractive option, and said it works well
cons: Some found this model to be a little on the big and bulky side

customer_reviews.title: If you like tea, this is the warmer to get!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Just one tea light in it keeps the tea warm for hours (I am talking like 4-5 hours, easy). The quality is just as good as the one that Teavanna sells, but this one is less than half the price of the one sold there. Even with the light in it, you can easily touch the sides to move it around. Almost all of the heat is directed up into the teapot and not into the body of the warmer. So good, I will probably buy another one or two!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it needs to!
customer_reviews.text: This teapot warmer is great! It holds a standard size tealight candle (not included, so make sure to buy some!), keeps your teapot at a great temperature. It is tall enough and has vent holes that keep the bottom of your teapot from getting coated in carbon. The table you have it sitting on does not get warm at all. The metal is very thick, and this thing is heavy! The little bits that stick up on the top are good at keeping the teapot from sliding around, and also keep the teapot warmer cool.
